channel.title: CVE Feed for frenify -- Categorify – WordPress Media Library Category & File Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for frenify -- Categorify – WordPress Media Library Category & File Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-0385|2024-03-13T15:26:35.905Z -- frenify -- categorify%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20media%20library%20category%20%26%20file%20manager
item.description: The Categorify plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the categorifyAjaxAddCategory function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.7.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to add categories.
